Name: cg_iric_open

Description: Set up solver option

Description: Reads the string attribute values of complex type grid attribute

Description: Reads f_functional attribute data of complex type grid attribute

Description: Gets the value of an string-type boundary condition

Description: Opens the geographic data file that contains polygon data

Description: Reads the value of polygon data as integer

Description: Reads the value of polygon datas double precision real

Description: Reads the number of polygon vertices

Description: Reads the coorinates of polygon vertices

Name: iric_geo_polygon_read_holecount
Description: Reads the number of holes in the polygon

Name: iric_geo_polygon_read_holepointcount
Description: Reads the number of vertices of hole polygon

Description: Reads the coordinates of hole polygon vertices

Description: Closes the geographic data file

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_open
Description: Opens the geographic data file that contains river survey data

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_count
Description: Reads the number of the crosssections in river survey data

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_position
Description: Reads the coordinates of the crosssection center point

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_direction
Description: Reads the direction of the crosssection as normalized vector

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_name
Description: Reads the name of the crosssection as string

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_realname
Description: Reads the name of the crosssection as real number

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_leftshift
Description: Reads the shift offset value of the crosssection

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_altitudecount
Description: Reads the number of altitude data of the crosssection

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_altitudes
Description: Reads the altitude data of the crosssection

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_fixedpointl
Description: Reads the data of left bank extension line of the crosssection

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_fixedpointr
Description: Reads the data of right bank extension line of the crosssection

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_read_watersurfaceelevation
Description: Reads the water elevation at the crosssection

Name: iric_geo_riversurvey_close
Description: Closes the geographic data file

Description: Inform the GUI that the solver finished outputting result
